description: This joke plays on the double meaning of 'freeze' relating to both winter and preserving history.
title: Timeless Winter
n_1: A chilly winter day at the history museum.
c1_1: Ah, winter! The perfect season for history.
n_2: Inside the museum, beside a historic artifact.
c1_2: Because it's when we can truly 'freeze' the moment!
c2_2: I should've guessed a pun was coming!
c1_3: Each artifact is a frozen piece of time.
c2_3: Quite literally today, it's freezing here!
n_4: Sharing a warm laugh amidst the cold.
c1_4: Let's keep history alive, even in winter!
c2_4: Agreed, as long as we have hot chocolate!
